title: Anacostia Park: Anacostia River Trail
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Anacostia River Trail              Anacostia River Trail         Walk, bike, or even roll on the Anacostia River Trail! NPS  Explore 3.5 miles of paved trail in Anacostia Park! The Anacostia River Trail is great for a casual stroll, a jog, a bike ride, or a dog walk. Along the way, you'll experience views of the Anacostia River and its wildlife, or maybe join a pick-up game on one of the playing fields or courts. The paved walkway continues across the bridges into downtown D.C. with access to the Navy Yard and Capitol Hill neighborhoods.
